info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 10294
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;api.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 10294
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;api.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	1800	IN	SOA	ns0.dom.scw.cloud. hostmaster.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr. 2025011601 10800 3600 604800 3600

info.name: security.txt File
author: bad5ect0r
noraj
info.description: File similar to robots.txt but intended to be read by humans wishing to contact a website’s owner about security issues. Often defines a security policy and contact details.

request:
GET /.well-known/security.txt HTTP/1.1
Host: api.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Accept-Ranges: bytes
Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: https://app.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr
Cache-Control: public, max-age=0
Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self';base-uri 'self';font-src 'self' https: data:;form-action 'self';frame-ancestors 'self';img-src 'self' data:;object-src 'none';script-src 'self';script-src-attr 'none';style-src 'self' https: 'unsafe-inline';upgrade-insecure-requests
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8
Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin
Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-origin
Date: Sun, 19 Jan 2025 02:48:05 GMT
Etag: W/"1c0-19474691f90"
Last-Modified: Fri, 17 Jan 2025 13:17:14 GMT
Origin-Agent-Cluster: ?1
Referrer-Policy: no-referrer
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains
Vary: Accept-Encoding, Origin
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Dns-Prefetch-Control: off
X-Download-Options: noopen
X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none
X-Xss-Protection: 0

Contact: mailto:security@covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr
Expires: 2024-12-31T23:00:00.000Z
Encryption: https://keys.openpgp.org/vks/v1/by-fingerprint/48103904BA3365543B27BF28F92CCE0585A4AE8F
Encryption: https://observatoire.covoiturage.gouv.fr/.well-known/security.asc
Preferred-Languages: fr, en
Canonical: https://observatoire.covoiturage.gouv.fr/.well-known/security.txt
Policy: https://observatoire.covoiturage.gouv.fr/.well-known/security-policy.txt

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: api.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found Connection: close Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true Access-Control-Allow-Origin: https://app.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none' Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-origin Date: Sun, 19 Jan 2025 02:48:19 GMT Origin-Agent-Cluster: ?1 Referrer-Policy: no-referrer Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains Vary: Accept-Encoding, Origin X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Dns-Prefetch-Control: off X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Xss-Protection: 0 Error 
Cannot POST /
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: api.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://api.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
